name: BIG
description: BIG is a memecoin on Avalanche that stands for "Believe In Greatness," built to inspire a winning mindset and empower ambition. With a bold narrative centered on aspiration, BIG taps into the dreams of crypto users, embodying the energy to achieve greatness. Represented by the mighty hippo—powerful, fearless, and confident—BIG is the movement that turns ambition into reality. Dream BIG, join the herd today and achieve greatness.
